original_text: All the people went to the temple of Baal. They destroyed it. They completely knocked down its altars and idols. They killed Baal's priest, Mattan, in front of Baal's altars.
korean_text: 온 국민이 바알의 신당으로 가서 그 신당을 부수고 그의 제단들과 형상들을 깨뜨리고 그 제단 앞에서 바알의 제사장 맛단을 죽이니라

sentences.original_text: All the people went to the temple of Baal.
They completely knocked down its altars.
They completely knocked down its idols.
They killed him in front of Baal's altars.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바알의 제단 앞에서 그를 죽였다.
